optionalfeature.name: Lesson of Dreams
entries: You gain the {@spell veil of dreams|APG} hex, and your familiar learns {@spell sleep}.

optionalfeature.name: Lesson of the Elements
entries: You gain the {@spell elemental betrayal|APG} hex. Your familiar learns your choice of {@spell burning hands}, {@spell air bubble}, {@spell hydraulic push}, or {@spell pummeling rubble|APG}.

optionalfeature.name: Lesson of Life
entries: You gain the {@spell life boost|APG} hex, and your familiar learns {@spell spirit link}.

optionalfeature.name: Lesson of Protection
entries: You gain the {@spell blood ward|APG} hex, and your familiar learns {@spell mage armor}.

optionalfeature.name: Lesson of Vengeance
entries: You gain the {@spell needle of vengeance|APG} hex, and your familiar learns {@spell phantom pain}.

optionalfeature.name: Lesson of Mischief
entries: You gain the {@spell deceiver's cloak|APG} hex, and your familiar learns {@spell mad monkeys|APG}.

optionalfeature.name: Lesson of Shadow
entries: You gain the {@spell malicious shadow|APG} hex, and your familiar learns {@spell chilling darkness}.

optionalfeature.name: Lesson of Snow
entries: You gain the {@spell personal blizzard|APG} hex, and your familiar learns {@spell wall of wind}.

optionalfeature.name: Lesson of Death
entries: You gain the {@spell curse of death|APG} hex, and your familiar learns {@spell raise dead}.

optionalfeature.name: Lesson of Renewal
entries: You gain the {@spell restorative moment|APG} hex, and your familiar learns {@spell field of life}.
